name: @plattar/plattar-ar-adapter
description: Plattar AR Adapter for interfacing with Google & Apple WebAR

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build-ts && npm run build-es2019 && npm run build-es2015
scripts.build-es2019: rm -rf build/es2019 && mkdir -p build/es2019 && browserify --standalone PlattarARAdapter dist/index.js -o build/es2019/plattar-ar-adapter.js && uglifyjs build/es2019/plattar-ar-adapter.js --output build/es2019/plattar-ar-adapter.min.js
scripts.build-es2015: rm -rf build/es2015 && mkdir -p build/es2015 && babel build/es2019/plattar-ar-adapter.js --presets=@babel/env > build/es2015/plattar-ar-adapter.js && uglifyjs build/es2015/plattar-ar-adapter.js --output build/es2015/plattar-ar-adapter.min.js
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build

author: plattar
